ComicInfo.Title: Blood Rivalry
ComicInfo.Summary:
Tech-9 and Holocaust engage in savage mortal combat over Syndicate leadership. Rob Chaplik learns what actually happened the night of the Big Bang. And Brickhouse learns that she isn’t crazy when her worst nightmare confronts her.
The fight to declare a leader to the Blood Syndicate is on, Holocaust wants nothing more than to end Tech 9 and take his leadership. The fight takes a turn as Holocaust plays dirty and attacks Tech 9 with everything hes got, will Tech 9 survive the battle and continue his leadership of the Blood Syndicate.
As the team reels from the fight Brick House is attacked by an unknown drone, as the drones attack her and over power her an unlikely and very foul odored creature arrives.
